Name: SmartHotel360
Description:
This template contains work items and code for SmartHotel360, an end-to-end reference application for the entire business, a website for booking a stay, and even an app for hotel employees to track and resolve maintenance issues. SmartHotel360 has many other reference applications, including a website powered by ASP.NET Core 2 for booking trips, and a sentiment analysis app for tracking customer experiences. Please see the project page on GitHub.

Lab URL: SmartHotel360
